thread.title: Lady Gaga's fiancé wants to act with her
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga's fiancé wants to act with her

title: Lady Gaga's fiancé wants to act with her
text:
Lady Gaga's fiancé wants to act with her 15th Oct 2015 6:00 AM Lady Gaga's partner Taylor Kinney wants to act with her. Bang ShowBiz Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
TAYLOR Kinney would love to act alongside his fiancée Lady Gaga and insists it wouldn't be "out of the realm of possibilities". 
The 'Chicago Fire' star would love to work with his fiancée on a television show and insists it wouldn't be "out of the realm of possibilities". 
He said: "I would love doing something with her. I don't know that we've done anything work-wise since [we met]. I wouldn't put that out of the realm of possibilities." 
And the 34-year-old actor has been working hard to help his "girl" prepare for her acting debut in 'American Horror Story: Hotel'. 
He told E! News: "I just wanted to help my girl prepare the best that she could, so that in itself has helped me just kind of get immersed in it, in the work, and that translates. The more you talk about it, the more you do it, that stays with you." 
The 29-year-old beauty recently revealed Taylor has been "exponentially supportive" of her move from music to television. 
She said: "What guy in that scenario would be like, 'Sure, babe, do TV!'?. He does TV, that's his thing. I do music, and you know, we're together. 
"But I sort of was like, 'Is it cool if I do TV?,' And he was like, 'F**k yeah! We can read scripts together, and we can talk about our characters together, and I can teach you how to be on set!'" acting role
